KSP Version - KSP2

Operating System and version  - Windows 10

GPU -RTX 3080 ti 

CPU - i7 12700kf

 

for all of my landed crafts, minus a rover, I've had a bug where if I try to load a quicksave, or take control of the craft, they load in at a negative altitude and start freefalling towards the center of the planet. This issue does not occur in every quicksave, but I've found the more times I try to take control of a craft or load a quicksave the higher the chance is to corrupt the save. If a save suddenly stops working, so do all other ones taken during the same flight (they are also afflicted by the same bug)
